description: Creates a network ACL in a VPC. Network ACLs provide an optional layer of security (in addition to security groups) for the instances in your VPC. For more information, see Network ACLs in the Amazon VPC User Guide.

parameters.name: TagSpecifications
parameters.description: The tags to assign to the network ACL. (dict) --- The tags to apply to a resource when the resource is being created. When you specify a tag, you must specify the resource type to tag, otherwise the request will fail. ResourceType (string) --- The type of resource to tag on creation. Tags (list) --- The tags to apply to the resource. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:. Value (string) --- The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters.

nested_params.name: ResourceType
nested_params.description: The type of resource to tag on creation.

nested_params.name: Tags
nested_params.description: The tags to apply to the resource.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. For more information, see Ensuring idempotency. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: NetworkAcl
nested_items.description: Information about the network ACL.

nested_items.name: Associations
nested_items.description: Any associations between the network ACL and your subnets.

nested_items.name: NetworkAclAssociationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the association between a network ACL and a subnet.

nested_items.name: NetworkAclId
nested_items.description: The ID of the network ACL.

nested_items.name: SubnetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the subnet.

nested_items.name: Entries
nested_items.description: The entries (rules) in the network ACL.

nested_items.name: CidrBlock
nested_items.description: The IPv4 network range to allow or deny, in CIDR notation.

nested_items.name: Egress
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the rule is an egress rule (applied to traffic leaving the subnet).

nested_items.name: IcmpTypeCode
nested_items.description: ICMP protocol: The ICMP type and code.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The ICMP code. A value of -1 means all codes for the specified ICMP type.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The ICMP type. A value of -1 means all types.

nested_items.name: Ipv6CidrBlock
nested_items.description: The IPv6 network range to allow or deny, in CIDR notation.

nested_items.name: PortRange
nested_items.description: TCP or UDP protocols: The range of ports the rule applies to.

nested_items.name: From
nested_items.description: The first port in the range.

nested_items.name: To
nested_items.description: The last port in the range.

nested_items.name: Protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol number. A value of '-1' means all protocols.

nested_items.name: RuleAction
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to allow or deny the traffic that matches the rule.

nested_items.name: RuleNumber
nested_items.description: The rule number for the entry. ACL entries are processed in ascending order by rule number.

nested_items.name: IsDefault
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this is the default network ACL for the VPC.

nested_items.name: NetworkAclId
nested_items.description: The ID of the network ACL.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Any tags assigned to the network ACL.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC for the network ACL.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the network ACL.

nested_items.name: ClientToken
nested_items.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure the idempotency of the request. Only returned if a client token was provided in the request.
